message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,450,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,400,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,425,000, which is still a great deal for you given the value of the product.  Let's meet in the middle on this.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,425,000, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,375,000. I hope we can reach a deal.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it's still a little too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go down to $1,400,000.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I hope we can finalize the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to squeeze every last dollar out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,380,000, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,380,000 is a bit too high for me. I can offer $1,375,000. I'm really hoping we can make a deal.
